obvious.ivtk.data
Class IvtkObviousSchema

java.lang.Object
  obvious.ivtk.data.IvtkObviousSchema
All Implemented Interfaces:
obvious.data.Data, obvious.data.Schema, obvious.data.Table, obvious.util.Adaptable
public class IvtkObviousSchema
extends java.lang.Object
implements obvious.data.Schema

This class is in an implementation of the Schema for the Obvious Ivtk binding. Since Ivtk does not have a schema structure, but use column object to store column description, this implementation is not a wrapper class. This class implements service introduced in Obvious schemas with a java collection of columns objects from Ivtk.

Author:
Pierre-Luc Hemery
See Also:
Schema
